meanings.definition: The act or process of quadrupling.
meanings.sent1: The quadruplication of her savings brought her great joy.
meanings.sent2: The quadruplication of the recipe made it perfect for the whole family.
meanings.sent3: The quadruplication of the number of cupcakes she baked accidentally caused a sweet overload.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was a quadruplication of what he had felt before.
meanings.sent5: The quadruplication of stars in the night sky was a breathtaking sight.

meanings.sent1: The cake had a delicious quadruplication of chocolate layers.
meanings.sent2: The quadruplication of customers at the store during the sale was overwhelming.
meanings.sent3: The quadruplication of his laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a quadruplication of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The quadruplication of flowers in the garden created a colorful paradise.

meanings.definition: To make or become four times as great.
meanings.sent1: She hoped to quadruplicate her earnings by investing wisely.
meanings.sent2: The company's profits quadruplicated after the new marketing campaign.
meanings.sent3: His excitement quadruplicated when he found out he won the contest.
meanings.sent4: The music quadruplicated the energy in the room, making everyone dance.
meanings.sent5: The storm's intensity quadruplicated as the winds picked up speed.
